channel.title: Finance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Finance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dallas mayor predicts 'avalanche' of NYC financial firms fleeing new socialist policies under Mamdani
item.description: Dallas Mayor Eric Johnson predicts financial firms will flee New York City for Texas as the Big Apple's new mayor pursues socialist policies.

item.title: Northern Lights Forecast: 15 States May See Aurora Thursday Night
item.description: A NOAA forecast suggest that Northern Lights may be visible in northern U.S. states Thursday, Jan. 8, through Friday, Jan. 9, as solar wind conditions...

item.title: Jensen Huang might be fine with a billionaires tax, but Google cofounder Larry Page is already dumping California
item.description: Page converted several of his assets out of California before the end of 2025, according to state filings.

item.title: Trump announces plans to ban institutional investors from buying single-family homes
item.description: President Donald Trump announced he is moving forward with plans to ban institutional investors from purchasing single-family homes in an effort to im...

item.title: Broadening Push To Extend Medicare Telehealth Coverage Includes Amazon
item.description: A coalition of telehealth providers from Amazon and Hims & Hers to hospital systems is working to extend pandemic-era waivers that allowed Medicare te...

item.title: GameSir, Hyperkin Unveil Jaw-Dropping Switch 2 And Mobile Controller

item.title: Stranger Things Episode 9 Fan Theory Still Spreading On Social Media
item.description: The Stranger Things Episode 9 fan theory is still spreading on social meda, even though there has been no official Netflix announcement or even a hint...

item.title: New vehicle sales to decline moderately in 2026 as affordability issues weigh, forecast says
item.description: Cox Automotive forecasts U.S. vehicle sales will decline 2.4% to 15.8 million units in 2026, with fleet sales dropping 6.1% as auto market slows.

item.title: Private sector added fewer-than-expected 41,000 jobs in December, ADP says
item.description: The figure reported on Wednesday is below economists’ estimates of an increase of 47,000 jobs and higher than the prior month’s revised reading of a l...

item.title: OpenAI launches ChatGPT Health in a push to become a hub for personal health data
item.description: The new consumer-facing product lets users connect medical records, wellness apps, and wearable data, extending the way in which millions of people al...

item.title: Hundreds Of Millions Of iPhones Now Affected By Apple’s New Update
item.description: Apple’s game-changing new iPhone update leaves all others phones behind.

item.title: RFK Jr. is pushing Americans to eat more red meat and dairy as Starbucks, Chipotle, and others cash in on protein craze
item.description: Americans want more protein in their diets, and brands have been happy to oblige.

item.title: Americans missed out on a ‘once-in-a-lifetime’ chance to buy a house—the 3 shifts it would take to make housing affordable are ‘very unlikely’
item.description: “We see the housing market remaining relatively stuck without major progress being made on affordability,” home construction CEO says.

item.title: Trump’s Greenland takeover would require ‘billions upon billions’ spent over decades to acquire a mineral industry that doesn’t yet exist, experts say
item.description: As the White House confirms military force is "always an option," experts say the costs—financial, strategic, and geopolitical—will be staggering.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
